name: Gravitating Robots in Space
description:
Hey! I  don't have a lot of time due to the deadline, but I just wanted to say thank you to everyone who will play this game, we really appreciate it! You can change the gravity by clicking on your right mouse button, A and D to move to left and right, space to jump and left mouse button to shoot. Again thank  you and I hope you enjoy it!

This game was made for the 5th Tairagames DevSquad jam
